Vote Title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to H.R. 6867
Document Text: A bill to provide for additional emergency unemployment compensation.
Result: Cloture Motion Agreed to (89-6, 3/5 majority required)

Question: On the Cloture Motion H.R. 7005
Vote Title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to Consider H.R. 7005.
Document Text: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide alternative minimum tax relief for individuals for 2008.
